content: **knitted socks for men in drops karisma the piece is worked top down with coloured christmas tree and snowman pattern sizes 38 46 theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern u-954 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes ** 38/40 - 41/43 - 44/46 foot-length 24-26-28 cm leg height approx 16-17-18 cm **yarn** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150-150 g colour 44 light grey 50-50-50 g colour 01 off white 50-50-50 g colour 47 forest green 50-50-50 g colour 53 anthracite **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge ** 22 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size #dropsalong
